${ModID}:Tenderizer.NAME: Tenderizer
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage this turn, apply #b{0} #yWeak.

${ModID}:DelayedVigor.NAME: Charging
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b{0} #yVigor in #b2 turns.
Gain #b{0} #yVigor in #b1 turn.

${ModID}:Sap.NAME: Sapped
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose [E] at the start of your next turn.
Lose #b{0} [E] at the start of your next turn.

${ModID}:HeartImpairment.NAME: Impaired
DESCRIPTIONS: The Heart is less dangerous.

${ModID}:NoxiousBrew.NAME: Noxious Brew
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn apply #b{0} #yPoison to a random enemy.

${ModID}:MushroomSoup.NAME: Mushroom Soup
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn gain #b{0} #yTemporary #yHP.

${ModID}:GremsFire.NAME: Grem's Fire
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn deal #b{0} damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Raging.NAME: Raging
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of its turn, gains #b{0} #yStrength.

${ModID}:GremlinNib.NAME: Nib Power
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b{0} Attacks you play, unleashes a powerful attack on its turn.

${ModID}:Bellow.NAME: Gremlin Roar
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an enemy doesn't attack on its turn, gain #b{0} #yStrength.

${ModID}:Critical.NAME: Critical
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next Attack deals #b{0} times as much damage.

${ModID}:OmegaCurse.NAME: Omega Curse
DESCRIPTIONS: Takes {0} more damage from Attacks.

${ModID}:Horde.NAME: Horde
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add #b1 random #yGremlin card into your hand.
At the start of your turn, add #b{0} random #yGremlin cards into your hand.

${ModID}:Rig.NAME: Rig
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, draw #b1 card and #yExhaust #b1 card.
At the start of your turn, draw #b{0} cards and #yExhaust #b{0} cards.

${ModID}:Inspired.NAME: Inspired
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b{0} energy and draw #b{0} card.
At the start of your turn, gain #b{0} energy and draw #b{0} cards.

${ModID}:Spiteful.NAME: Spiteful
DESCRIPTIONS: When its HP is at or below #b50%, will stop attacking for 2 turns before unleashing a powerful curse.
